Date Registered:
August 02, 2007, 07:04:40 AM

and I hardly know who any of you are, registration date means shit people.
[/quote]

Piss off back to the RS2 section numbskull.[/quote]

Yong min i honestly didn’t expect you to talk out of your ass so fluently, held you in too high of regard i suppose. Do not talk about that which you do not understand.

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:35, topic:435356”]ok now when i compile i get cannot find symbol. variable session

[/quote]

Change the Session to session and make sure your getLogin method looks like:

public static int getLogin(String user, String pass, IoSession session) {

Also import the IoSession class

import org.apache.mina.common.IoSession;

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @amfg amfg
item.description:
@amfg wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:32, topic:435356"][quote author=yong min link=topic=538074.msg3937063#msg3937063 date=1331117723]

Give it a rest Luke. You think you’re something that you clearly aren’t.

I’m defending Dgc2002 against your stupidity. I don’t understand why you’re so fixated with thinking this is about me…

I won’t give you the satisfaction and reply to your posts after this. You are a power hungry geek who thinks they’re better than everyone else. Go back to your PHP and SQL shit and let Zilent do all the work.

He has not been involved with the RSC section on Mopar’, that is why I said what I did. You claim he’s active on RSCE forums, big fucking deal? That proves nothing.
[/quote]
‘thinks they’re better than everyone else.’ <-- That part fits on you too. Yet all of your work has been horrible, I wonder why you act so tough and cool around here, you’re just a retarded asian.[/quote]

He isn’t asian, he just pretends to be in order to look smarter.

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

-Nothing:

‘thinks they’re better than everyone else.’ <-- That part fits on you too. Yet all of your work has been horrible, I wonder why you act so tough and cool around here, you’re just a retarded asian.

Yong Min is a nice friendly person, if he said something bad/good to someone i know those are the same reasons you guys say something to others. So there is no need to be hypocritical while the only contribution you guys do is constant flaming or/and bashing other members.

And for kriptix suddenly defending dgc2002 looks pretty suspicious, maybe he do the dirty work for him?

edit: or maybe not

[quote=“Dgc2002, post:22, topic:430548”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=533228.msg3898819#msg3898819 date=1327556258]
I’m not sure who Zilent is, but everyone knows I have nothing against Kryptix, as a lot the RSC section has accused me of being biased in his favor :rolleyes:

One possibility is a staff member’s account has been compromised, I know mine was a few months ago soon after the database leak. You RSC people need to find better ways to sort out your issues, the amounts of underhand dealing and activity here is disgusting.
[/quote]
Shits been going on like this for ~ a decade steady. One main reason theres so many twats around is because most of the surviving RSC players come from cheating communities so there’s more bad apples than usual. Plenty of jealous/petty/whiny people who hide behind a botnet thinking it gives legitimacy to their views, it gets real old real fast.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

yong min:

He’s not been involved in it around here. Also, why does everything have to resolve around you?

By ‘around here’ do you mean Mopar? The RS2 forum with an added RSC section? No one had ever heard of you until Mopar, you’re as ‘RS2’ as they get so it’s laughable that you’re telling an old RSC veteran to go back to RS2 because he hasn’t posted any stupid EasyRSC guides.

I only used myself as an example because I can’t think of anyone else that you have heard of that was known back on RSC. You didn’t even know who Kaitnieks was FFS.

Read full topic

I actually know who he is, yet I have NO idea who you are.

Then you haven’t been here too long. At least his contributions aren’t riddled with fail trolling.
[/quote]Date Registered:
February 02, 2008, 04:22:56 PM - This is me
Date Registered:
October 24, 2008, 08:05:13 PM - This is you
Now, if you do some simple math, you find out how much more educated I am than you, obviously, me being educated am obviously not going to do the math myself.[/quote]

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:9, topic:435356”][quote author=Ecko link=topic=538074.msg3935989#msg3935989 date=1331060499]

I actually know who he is, yet I have NO idea who you are.

Then you haven’t been here too long. At least his contributions aren’t riddled with fail trolling.
[/quote]Date Registered:
February 02, 2008, 04:22:56 PM - This is me
Date Registered:
October 24, 2008, 08:05:13 PM - This is you
Now, if you do some simple math, you find out how much more educated I am than you, obviously, me being educated am obviously not going to do the math myself.[/quote]

Hmm.

If you are as “educated” as you claimed to be, which I highly doubt, you wouldn’t have used the word “obviously” twice in one sentence. In addition to that, you wouldn’t have jumped to the ignorant conclusion that a registration date is the ultimate determination of ones level of “education”. See what I did there? Please take a lap.

Now, back to the topic. Very nice release. It’s good to see people still contributing to the RSC section. (y)

Read full topic

item.title: [EasyRsc] 10 minutes waiting period to register character
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:19, topic:435356”][quote author=Vibes link=topic=538074.msg3936391#msg3936391 date=1331075573]
for me the variable ip and lastIPS are not found
[/quote]

Add:

private static java.util.HashMap<String, Long> lastIPs = new java.util.HashMap<String, Long>();

And find the getLogin method and after String pass, add String ip.[/quote]I will slice your scrotum in two if you ever have someone type out the fully qualified class name like that ever again.

Also, the type of lastIPs should be Map instead of HashMap.

Read full topic
